verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'When <S%H3588><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> gives <S%H2232><s%> birth <S%H2232><s%> and bears <S%H3205><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> [child], then she shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her menstruation <S%H5079><s%> <S%H1738><s%> she shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>
'And on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his foreskin <S%H6190><s%> shall be circumcised. <S%H4135><s%>

'Then she shall remain <S%H3427><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of [her] purification <S%H2893><s%> for thirty-three days; <S%H3117><s%> she shall not touch <S%H5060><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> consecrated <S%H6944><s%> thing, <S%H6944><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> the sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of her purification <S%H2892><s%> are completed. <S%H4390><s%>

'But if <S%H518><s%> she bears <S%H3205><s%> a female <S%H5347><s%> [child], then she shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> for two weeks, <S%H7620><s%> as in her menstruation; <S%H5079><s%> and she shall remain <S%H3427><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of [her] purification <S%H2893><s%> for sixty-six days. <S%H3117><s%>

'And when the days <S%H3117><s%> of her purification <S%H2892><s%> are completed, <S%H4390><s%> for a son <S%H1121><s%> or <S%H176><s%> for a daughter, <S%H1323><s%> she shall bring <S%H935><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> a one year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> and a young <S%H1121><s%> pigeon <S%H3123><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a turtledove <S%H8449><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering. <S%H9128><s%>

'Then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for her; and she shall be cleansed <S%H2891><s%> from the flow <S%H4726><s%> of her blood. <S%H1818><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> for her who bears <S%H3205><s%> [a child, whether] a male <S%H2145><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a female. <S%H5347><s%>

'But if <S%H518><s%> she cannot <S%H3808><s%> afford <S%H4672><s%> <S%H3027><s%> a lamb, <S%H7716><s%> then she shall take <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> turtledoves <S%H8449><s%> or <S%H176><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons, <S%H3123><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> for a sin <S%H9128><s%> offering; <S%H9128><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for her, and she shall be clean. <S%H2891><s%> ' "
